about.title: About Me
about.greeting: Hello! I'm Brian Bentancourt, a passionate and results-driven software developer with a knack for creating engaging and user-friendly digital experiences. With several years in the industry, I've honed my skills in front-end and back-end development, user interface design, and integrating cutting-edge technologies like AI.
about.journey: My journey in tech began with a fascination for how software can solve real-world problems and enhance human interaction. This curiosity has led me to continuously learn and adapt, always seeking new challenges and opportunities to grow. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy bringing ideas to life, from initial concept to final deployment.
about.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new AI research, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying time with family and friends. I believe in a balanced approach to work and life, fostering creativity and innovation.

chatbotIntroductionSection.description: Have questions about my skills, projects, or experience? My AI assistant is here to help! Click the chat icon in the bottom-right corner to start a conversation. You can ask things like:
chatbotIntroductionSection.example2: "Tell me more about the Food Store project."
chatbotIntroductionSection.actionPrompt: Go ahead, give it a try!
chatbotIntroductionSection.aiNoteText: The AI assistant provides information based on pre-programmed context about my profile. For direct contact or detailed discussions, please use the contact form or the WhatsApp button.
